channel.title: [Help] Talking npc

item.title: [Help] Talking npc
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey, I don’t have been making server for 3 months. so i don’t remember how to make my npc talking (Like Hello, next bahnah next options and i can make teleport button, and bye bye button if you can help i will be happy.

Got this code atm:

if (NPCID == 945) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(945), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome to project Scape", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(945, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

I need to add an extra line how i do? and then you click “continue” you shall be taking to an option -> Go to the world or Bye bye <-
HELP!

Read full topic
